translation.en: Or what they're capable of.

translation.en: You know that about someone…

translation.en: Well, then, maybe…

translation.en: maybe then you can say that you know 'em.

translation.en: But then again,

translation.en: you know that…

translation.en: maybe you wouldn't want to.
translation.zh: 或许你就不想了解了

translation.zh: 我儿子为什么要骗我？

translation.en: All right, how about this. Whether you saw it, didn't see it, like it,
translation.zh: 好吧 这样吧 不管你看没看

translation.en: didn't like it, it doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 喜不喜欢 都无所谓

translation.en: The studio wants to give me $25 million to do another one.
translation.zh: 制片公司想给我2500万美元再拍一部续集

translation.en: -Whoo. Damn. -Somewhere somebody likes it.
translation.zh: -哎呀-所以这电影肯定有市场

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Yeah, well, that's good, they definitely do that.
translation.zh: 对 真好 他们必须拍

translation.en: 'Cause kiddies love that shit.
translation.zh: 因为小屁孩爱看那种电影

translation.en: Is that the third or fourth "kiddies"?
translation.zh: 这是你第三次还是第四次说“小屁孩”？

translation.en: -Mm. -Can't keep track at this point.
translation.zh: 我现在都数乱了

translation.en: I'm sorry about the restaurant.
translation.zh: 餐厅的事我很遗憾

translation.en: We ain't dead yet, man.
translation.zh: 我们还没死翘翘呢 伙计

translation.en: Just gotta work some things out. We ain't dead.
translation.zh: 只要解决一些问题就好我们还没死翘翘

translation.en: -I still got the liquor license, though. -But you got no restaurant.
translation.zh: -但我还有售酒证-但餐厅没戏了

translation.en: But as long as I got the liquor license, I can come back.
translation.zh: 但只要我有售酒证 就能东山再起

translation.en: A liquor license means nothing without the restaurant.
translation.zh: 没了餐厅 售酒证毫无意义

translation.en: What are you in, 1.3 mil now?
translation.zh: 你现在欠了多少钱？130万吗？

translation.en: It's over.
translation.zh: 结束了

translation.en: No. Nah. it ain't over. I know we in deep, but, you know, look, bro.
translation.zh: 不 没有结束 我知道我们负债累累但你听着 弟弟

translation.en: The liquor license is non-transferable.
translation.zh: 售酒证不能转让

translation.en: That's, like, 400, 500K, man.
translation.zh: 那个证值个四五十万

translation.en: Yo, we're good.
translation.zh: 嘿 我们没事

translation.en: Terry told me you asked for $600,000.
translation.zh: 泰瑞跟我说你找他要60万美元

translation.en: -Terry got an attitude, man! -Cut the shit, man.
translation.zh: -泰瑞那家伙狗仗人势！-行了 伙计

translation.en: -Terry got an attitude! -Man, stop.
translation.zh: -他就是狗仗人势！-别说了

translation.en: -I wanted to check that mother-- -Stop. Stop.
translation.zh: -我想教训一下那王八…-别说了

translation.en: Six hundred thousand dollars, C?
translation.zh: 六十万美元 大卡？

translation.en: Look, look, look. It takes money to make money, right?
translation.zh: 听着 钱能生钱 好吗？

translation.en: You know that.
translation.zh: 你知道的

translation.en: When have you made money?
translation.zh: 你什么时候赚到过钱？

translation.en: Tell me when you've made money.
translation.zh: 告诉我 你什么时候赚到过钱

translation.en: You had the car wash.
translation.zh: 你开过洗车行

translation.en: After, you had the check-cashing place, but that kept getting robbed.
translation.zh: 还搞过支票兑现生意 但总是被抢

translation.en: Now we're at a restaurant. At this point, it's not about the money.
translation.zh: 现在又是餐厅 到了这时候已经不是钱的问题了

translation.en: Hey. Hey, I know, man.
translation.zh: 嘿 我知道

translation.en: I know I done fucked up some shit.
translation.zh: 我知道自己砸锅了

translation.en: I ain't trying to be, like, the burden all the time.
translation.zh: 我也不想一直拖累你

translation.en: Tell you what. Let's not do it.
translation.zh: 听着 我们现在别吵了

translation.en: I just got here, just checked in, I see my older brother. I don't wanna do this.
translation.zh: 我刚到费城 入住酒店见到哥哥 我不想跟你吵

translation.en: -Yeah. -Let's have a good time.
translation.zh: -对-我们好好玩玩

translation.en: -Yeah. That's right. Yeah. -Right?
translation.zh: -对 没错 是的-对吧？

translation.en: All the boys, all your whole crew gonna be there tonight.
translation.zh: 你的发小还有朋友 他们今晚都会来

translation.en: -Now… Now we're talking. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 这才像话嘛

translation.en: The whole crew? Is Gus gonna be there?
translation.zh: 他们全都来吗？格斯来吗？

translation.en: I ain't seen Gus in the longest time, man. I miss Gus. Talking shit.
translation.zh: 我太久没见格斯了 我好想他 真的

translation.en: -Gus not gonna be there, man. -Why?
translation.zh: -格斯不会来了 伙计-为什么？

translation.en: Gus dead, man.
translation.zh: 格斯死了

translation.en: What the fuck you mean, Gus died? What?
translation.zh: 你什么意思 格斯死了？你说什么？

translation.en: Nobody tell me Gus died. Why didn't you tell Gus died?
translation.zh: 没人告诉我格斯死了你怎么没告诉我？

translation.en: 'Cause Gus ain't dead!
translation.zh: 因为格斯没死啊！

translation.en: -Yes. Yes, good one. -Every now and then, right?
translation.zh: -好吧 真好笑-我还是有两把刷子的 对吧？

translation.en: I told you to get dressed. This what you're wearing tonight?
translation.zh: 我让你去穿好衣服你今晚就穿这个吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. What's wrong with this? -That's what you're wearing.
translation.zh: -这身怎么了？-你要穿这个

translation.en: -Want me to double breast it? -No, no, no. You do you.
translation.zh: -想让我穿件双排扣上衣？-不是 你随意吧

translation.en: That's your vibe, not mine.
translation.zh: 这是你的风格 不是我的

translation.en: I'ma go get dressed.
translation.zh: 我要去换衣服

translation.en: Uh… I'll be out in a little bit.
translation.zh: 很快出来

translation.en: -We're gonna have a good time tonight. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我们今晚好好乐一乐-好

translation.en: [Kid] Seemed he was starting to get comfortable with us being apart.
translation.zh: 貌似他已经开始适应我们分开的事实了

translation.en: [woman on phone] Seems so, but he wants to come see you on the road.
translation.zh: 貌似是这样 但他想去看你巡演

translation.en: [Kid] I would love that. I don't know how I would make that work.
translation.zh: 好啊 只是我不知道该怎么安排

translation.en: I don't want him to think that I'm not focused on him, you know what I mean,
translation.zh: 我只是不希望他觉得我不关注他

translation.en: and… and his needs.
translation.zh: 和他的需求

translation.en: With you being a baby momma now, I gotta up the ante on my presence.
translation.zh: 尤其是你现在对他无微不至我得增加点自己的存在感了

translation.en: [woman] Ha ha. And the award for best divorced couple goes to…
translation.zh: 最佳离婚夫妇奖的获得者是…

translation.en: Look, if it can be done, we're gonna do it at a very high level.
translation.zh: 听着 如果可以的话我们要成为最佳厉害父母

translation.en: Uh, I need your opinion on something. What do you think about this joke?
translation.zh: 我需要问问你的意见你觉得这个段子怎么样？

translation.en: "My son's friends really do think I'm a superhero,
translation.zh: “我儿子的朋友真的以为我是超级英雄

translation.en: and now those little fuckers wanna fight me."
translation.zh: 现在那些小混蛋都想跟我过过招”

translation.en: Mmm… Nah.
translation.zh: 不好

translation.en: Let me give it a little punch.
translation.zh: 我换个语气

translation.en: "My son's friends really think I'm a superhero and now…"
translation.zh: “我儿子的朋友真的以为我是超级英雄 现在…”

translation.en: Yeah, no, fuck it.
translation.zh: 确实不行 算了

translation.en: It's stupid, I'll throw it away.
translation.zh: 太蠢了 我放弃

translation.en: All right, I gotta go. Tell Christian I love him. I miss him.
translation.zh: 我得挂了 告诉克里斯汀我爱他我想他

translation.en: He's my everything. All of the above. Okay?
translation.zh: 他是我的一切 所有的所有 好吗？

translation.en: I will.
translation.zh: 我会的

translation.en: -Hey. -Yo.
translation.zh: -嘿-怎么了？

translation.en: Are you nervous? It's the first time you've been out in quite a while.
translation.zh: 你是不是紧张了？毕竟你很久没登过台了

translation.en: I ask for your opinion on a joke, and you take that as me being nervous?
translation.zh: 我问你一个段子好不好你就以为我紧张了？

translation.en: Concerts don't make me nervous.
translation.zh: 上台演出不会让我紧张

translation.en: Now, am I annoyed? That would've been a better question.
translation.zh: 那我生气了吗？你还不如问这个呢

translation.en: That, I am. Doing damage control with Carlton.
translation.zh: 我是生气因为得给卡尔顿收拾烂摊子

translation.en: [Herschel] Yo, Kid, we gotta make soundcheck!
translation.zh: 嘿 基德 该去测音了！

translation.en: All right, gimme two minutes, Hersch. Here I come.
translation.zh: 好 等我两分钟 赫尔希 我马上过去

translation.en: -I'm serious, I gotta go, Mo. All right? -Good luck, and baby needs some new shoes!
translation.zh: -真的 我得挂了 小莫 好吗？-祝你好运 你的小宝贝需要钱哦！

translation.en: Baby has a $17 million house, so baby can kiss my ass. Bye.
translation.zh: 小宝贝已经住上了1700万美元的豪宅让她哪凉快哪呆着去吧 再见

translation.en: [comedian] All right, believe it or not, y'all, that's my time, Philly!
translation.zh: 好了 不管你们相信与否我说完了 费城！

translation.en: You already know who's coming up next!
translation.zh: 你们都知道要上台的是谁！

translation.en: One of the funniest motherfuckers in the business.
translation.zh: 喜剧行业里最搞笑的人

translation.en: I'm talking about billions of dollars in the movies.
translation.zh: 我说的可是十亿美元票房先生

translation.en: Showcases. Comedy showcases. This nigga done been all around the world.
translation.zh: 模范人物 喜剧行业的模范人物这家伙火遍全球

translation.en: -[Kid] All right. Showtime. -[Herschel] Showtime, baby, showtime.
translation.zh: -好了 该登台了-该登台了 宝贝 该登台了

translation.en: Y'all know how we do, we go to bring it in.
translation.zh: 你们知道规矩 我们得一起抱一下

translation.en: -Let's get this prayer in. -[Kid] Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -大家聚过来一起祈祷-遵命

translation.en: Here we go. All right, dear Lord,
translation.zh: 来吧 好的 亲爱的主

translation.en: let these jokes be funny and the reviews be good. Amen!
translation.zh: 希望今晚的段子嗨翻全场好评如潮 阿门！

translation.en: -Amen to that, the reviews are good. -[Billie laughs]
translation.zh: 阿门 希望好评如潮

translation.en: The reviews are always good. Okay?
translation.zh: 好评向来如潮 对吧？

translation.en: -[Todd] Go get it! -Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -加油！-遵命

translation.en: -I want seconds! -They're ready?
translation.zh: -我还意犹未尽！-观众情绪上来了吗？

translation.en: -[comedian] They're ready. -My guy!
translation.zh: -上来了-我的好兄弟！

translation.en: All right, you motherfuckers ready to have a good time tonight?
translation.zh: 好的 大家今晚准备好乐一乐了吗？

translation.en: [Kid] Wassup, Philly?
translation.zh: 你好啊 费城

translation.en: Y'all ready to have a good time tonight?
translation.zh: 你们今晚准备好嗨翻天了吗？

translation.en: That's not good enough, I can't hear y'all.
translation.zh: 这还不够 我听不到你们所有人

translation.en: I said, y'all ready to have a good time tonight?
translation.zh: 我刚才说你们今晚准备好嗨翻天了吗？

translation.en: -[Todd] Fucking unbelievable! -Dude, it felt so good.
translation.zh: -真是不可思议！-伙计 效果太棒了

translation.en: -It did? That was like… Ah! -So good.
translation.zh: -是吗？简直…-太棒了

translation.en: -So good. [laughs] -So good.
translation.zh: -太棒了-太棒了

translation.en: Your brother and his crew, they're backstage.
translation.zh: 你哥哥和他的朋友都在后台

translation.en: -I gave 'em a wave, they're in the corner. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我跟他们打了个招呼 他们在角落里-好

translation.en: Okay. Let me just put this in your head real quick, okay?
translation.zh: 好的 我三言两语跟你说一下 好吗？

translation.en: This is when Carlton starts to become Carlton.
translation.zh: 卡尔顿这时候会开始现原形

translation.en: VIP room wasn't good enough, so I made him a V-VIP room.
translation.zh: 贵宾室不够他折腾所以我给他订了超级贵宾室

translation.en: I don't know what that is. I made that up.
translation.zh: 我不知道那是什么玩意 我瞎编的

translation.en: I watch you take baby steps with him, you don't take them with other people.
translation.zh: 我看到你对他很耐心你对别人可不是这样

translation.en: Todd, just leave it the fuck alone, man.
translation.zh: 你别管了 伙计

translation.en: -Please, just leave it alone. -[Todd sighs]
translation.zh: 拜托了 你别管

translation.en: I know how to deal with my brother.
translation.zh: 我知道怎么应付我哥

translation.en: -I do. -Yes, you do. Okay.
translation.zh: -真的-你当然知道 好吧

translation.en: I know this Black family politics thing is tough for you.
translation.zh: 我知道黑人家庭政治让你很头疼

translation.en: You're talking to a Jew from Texas. I know crazy families.
translation.zh: 你在跟一个来自德州的犹太人说话这事儿我门清

translation.en: Let me do the bits, Todd.
translation.zh: 让我说这个梗 托德

translation.en: -On a serious note, look, for me. -You don't have to--
translation.zh: -我说真的 伙计-你不必…

translation.en: -No. -Okay.
translation.zh: -别说了-好吧

translation.en: Eye to eye.
translation.zh: 我对你郑重发誓

translation.en: I promise you Carlton will no longer fuck up my life after tonight.
translation.zh: 我保证今晚过后卡尔顿再也不会扰乱我的人生

translation.en: -All right? -Thank you.
translation.zh: -好吗？-谢谢

translation.en: -I love you, man. -I love you back.
translation.zh: -我爱你 伙计-我也爱你

translation.en: I'll be out there with them.
translation.zh: 我出去找他们

translation.en: Hey, Todd, why did he cut all my jokes tonight?
translation.zh: 托德 他今晚为什么把我的段子都删掉？

translation.en: Why do you act like it's the first time? Just go with the flow.
translation.zh: 你干吗一副少见多怪的样子？听天由命就好

translation.en: Yeah, I might have a different flow.
translation.zh: 但我现在有了另一条命

translation.en: Okay, what? Clarify.
translation.zh: 好吧 什么意思？说清楚

translation.en: It's what I was trying to tell you on the plane.
translation.zh: 我想在飞机上告诉你们的

translation.en: I'm not gonna keep writing discarded material.
translation.zh: 我不要继续写被抛弃的段子了

translation.en: Not when I have a new job offer I could be focusing on.
translation.zh: 尤其是我现在有了一个可以专心做好的工作邀约

translation.en: -Oh. Okay. What's the new job offer? -Writing a script for Will Ferrell.
translation.zh: -好吧 新的工作邀约是什么？-给威尔·法瑞尔写剧本

translation.en: He read one of my scripts, he dug it, and wants me to do one for him.
translation.zh: 他看了我的一篇剧本 很是喜欢所以想请我给他写

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: I just… I feel like I need to tell Kid.
translation.zh: 我感觉得告诉基德

translation.en: That you're leaving the show?
translation.zh: 说你要离开他的团队吗？

translation.en: [scoffs] If he's not using my material, then what am I doing here?
translation.zh: 如果他不用我写的段子我还留在这里干吗？

translation.en: Yeah, sorry, you can't leave. No.
translation.zh: 好吧 但抱歉 你不能走

translation.en: Because I'm so valuable to him?
translation.zh: 因为我对他来说价值连城吗？

translation.en: Like, he just needs my jokes so much?
translation.zh: 他迫切需要我的段子？

translation.en: Billie, it's not just the jokes. It's the banter.
translation.zh: 不仅是因为段子还因为你跟他打趣斗嘴

translation.en: Your presence. It's like we're a little family.
translation.zh: 你的存在 我们是一个小家庭

translation.en: It's the way you give him shit, makes him feel normal.
translation.zh: 你的戏谑让他觉得自己是个正常人

translation.en: And it keeps you paid.
translation.zh: 而且你也能拿到工资

translation.en: Very, very well.
translation.zh: 高额工资

translation.en: -Can I give you a piece of advice? -Sure.
translation.zh: -我能给你一个建议吗？-说吧

translation.en: If you tell me to chill out or have a drink, I'm gonna poke out your eyes.
translation.zh: 如果你让我冷静或是去喝一杯我就抠出你的眼珠子

translation.en: You can do both these things.
translation.zh: 你可以鱼与熊掌兼得

translation.en: Take the job, keep your mouth shut about it, keep fighting for your jokes.
translation.zh: 接受那份工作 别说出去然后继续为自己的段子抗争

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Yeah. Okay. But only if he knows I'm doing both.
translation.zh: 好吧 但他必须知道我在做两份工作

translation.en: Okay. But you let me figure out when to tell him.
translation.zh: 没问题 但让我决定什么时候告诉他

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 可以

translation.en: -Have a good night. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -祝你今晚愉快-谢谢

translation.en: -[Todd] Congratulations. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -恭喜了-好

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: -What up, champ? -What's up, man?
translation.zh: -你好 朋友-你好 伙计

translation.en: -Nice. -[man] Yo.
translation.zh: 不错

translation.en: My guy. Appreciate you.
translation.zh: 我的朋友 感谢你

translation.en: Hey. Wassup, man?
translation.zh: 嘿 你好啊 伙计

translation.en: -Chilling. -All right?
translation.zh: -不错-是吗？

translation.en: Enjoyed the show. I'm glad. I'm glad.
translation.zh: 好好看表演吧 我很开心

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.zh: 我们过去吧

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 跟我走

translation.en: You! Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey.
-Hey! -[friends cheering]
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: What's up? What's up, man?
translation.zh: 你好啊 伙计

translation.en: -Wassup! It's good to see you. -[Kid] Long time, man!
translation.zh: -你好！见到你真是太好了-好久不见 伙计！

translation.en: -Good to see you. Gus! -My brother!
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你 格斯！-我的兄弟！

translation.en: -Now, right here been a minute! -Goddamn!
translation.zh: -真是好久不见！-可不是！

translation.en: -Man! -How y'all doing, man?
translation.zh: -伙计！-你怎么样 伙计？

translation.en: -Not as good as you. Better than Carlton. -Stop it.
translation.zh: -不如你 但比卡尔顿强-闭嘴吧

translation.en: -Come on. Come on. -Whatever, man, whatever.
translation.zh: -行了-随便吧 伙计 随便吧

translation.en: Okay, so what we into? What we into?
translation.zh: 好了 我们接下来做什么？

translation.en: What you mean? You know we gonna hit the club.
translation.zh: 什么意思？你知道我们要去夜店

translation.en: -I know you rolling, right, superstar? -The club? With y'all suckers?
translation.zh: -我知道你会去 对吧 超级明星？-夜店？跟你们这些笨蛋？

translation.en: No. My brother knows how to remove himself from the scene of the crime.
translation.zh: 不行 我弟弟知道如何离犯罪现场远远的

translation.en: And, plus, he's got his chaperone over there.
translation.zh: 而且他的保镖在那里站着呢

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -This is weird for you? -Look how serious he is.
translation.zh: -你们觉得不自在？-瞧瞧他有多严肃

translation.en: Say no more. Say no more.
translation.zh: 别说了

translation.en: I'm not here to put a weird vibe in here with my guys.
translation.zh: 我过来不是为了害你们不自在

translation.en: Hey, just gimme a sec, man. My guy. Thank you.
translation.zh: 你先出去一下 朋友 谢谢

translation.en: Okay, is that better? That better? Are we good?
translation.zh: 好的 现在好多了吧？没事了吧？

translation.en: [man] You need some drinks for that. I'm on drinks. Let's do this.
translation.zh: 我得敬你一被 我要喝一杯 来吧

translation.en: Yeah, man, come on. Let's do it.
translation.zh: 是啊 伙计 我们去喝酒

translation.en: -Drinks? Drinks? -[man] Or shots?
translation.zh: -喝酒？-还是一口闷？

translation.en: -Yeah, that top-shelf vodka. -[man] Yeah.

translation.zh: 你多年来日益精进的废物技能

translation.en: guess what, it finally rubbed off.

translation.en: I'm right there with you, but now I got a lot more to lose than just my career.
translation.zh: 我此刻虽然跟你在一起但要赔上的不只是自己的事业

translation.en: A whole lot more.

translation.en: [chuckles] Your bitch-ass is all bold now that the body gone?

translation.en: "Bitch-ass" now.
translation.zh: 支棱起来

translation.en: Look, if you think I fucked up, then,
translation.zh: 听着 如果你觉得我搞砸了

translation.en: you can go ahead and deal with Ari any way you choose.

translation.en: But just remember this…

translation.en: This time, you ain't paying for my fuck-up.

translation.en: This one is all yours.
translation.zh: 而是替自己擦

translation.en: Bruh.
translation.zh: 弟弟

translation.en: -[male voice] Hello. -Hey.
translation.zh: -喂-嘿

translation.en: -Hey. What up, Terry? Can you hear me? -Kid, is that you?
translation.zh: -你好 泰瑞 你能听见我说话吗？-基德 是你吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it's me.
translation.zh: 对 是我

translation.en: What time is it? Are you okay?

translation.en: Yeah, I'm good, it's, uh… You know.

translation.en: It's a little late, but I'm straight. Dude, I'm thinking--

translation.en: I think it's time that I, um…

translation.en: I start doing more for my family, man, right?

translation.en: Like, mainly… mainly Carlton.

translation.en: [Terry] You didn't talk to him, did you?

translation.en: No, we talked. We had a long talk, actually.

translation.en: You know, maybe we should get Todd up. Huh?
translation.zh: 或许应该把托德叫起来

translation.en: -No. Don't do that, Terry. -What?
translation.zh: -别 不用 泰瑞-什么？

translation.en: Don't fucking do that, man.
translation.zh: 千万别叫他 伙计

translation.en: -I didn't call Todd, I called you. -No, I know.
translation.zh: -我没打给托德 而是打给了你-对 我知道

translation.en: Now, what I want you to do is listen.
translation.zh: 我希望你好好听着

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: For a change, just listen.
translation.zh: 这次你就好好听我说

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I, um…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: I just want to set Carlton up one last time.
translation.zh: 我想最后一次给卡尔顿一笔钱

translation.en: Okay, all right. How much? When?
translation.zh: 好 多少？什么时候？

translation.en: I feel like if I'm gonna do it, I just wanna do it right, so…
translation.zh: 我想着既然要给 就多给点 所以…

translation.en: you know, I wanna give him like…
translation.zh: 我想给他…

translation.en: I wanna give him, like, 500.
translation.zh: 我想给他五十万

translation.en: 500K at the top of every month.
translation.zh: 每个月初给五十万

translation.en: For the next year.
translation.zh: 持续一年

translation.en: Kid, do you need me to send the police to your room right now?
translation.zh: 基德 你用我现在让警察去你房间吗？

translation.en: -I mean, just gimme a sign. Is he there? -No, Terry. What did I ask you to do?
translation.zh: 你给我一个暗示 不用 泰瑞 我刚怎么跟你说的？

translation.en: -I know, but-- -What did I ask you to do?
translation.zh: -我知道 但是…-我刚怎么跟你说的？

translation.en: -Yeah, but-- -I said, for once, do your fucking job.
translation.zh: -没错 可是…-我让你这次好好办事

translation.en: -I understand. -What I asked you to set my brother up.
translation.zh: -我明白-我让你给我哥打钱

translation.en: That means, in the morning, call the fucking bank,
translation.zh: 也就是说 明天一大早打给银行

translation.en: tell the bank what I need.
translation.zh: 告诉银行我的需求

translation.en: Transfer the money so it goes to Carlton's account,

translation.en: and then… and then, moving forward,
translation.zh: 然后接下来

translation.en: do the same thing at the top of the month so it goes down for the--
translation.zh: 每个月的第一天给他打钱 一直持续…

translation.en: Okay. Kid, you just can't give somebody that kind of money.
translation.zh: 好的 基德你不能随便给其他人转这么多钱

translation.en: You can't.
translation.zh: 真的不能

translation.en: You have to report something like this, declare it.
translation.zh: 这种事得备案 你得申报

translation.en: What are you talking about? When--? Since when?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？什么时候…什么时候开始的？

translation.en: I didn't-- Name another time when I've had to do it.
translation.zh: 我之前…你跟我说说之前哪次用这么做了

translation.en: It's the law. We get audited every year for every dime you spend.
translation.zh: 这是法律 你花的每一分钱每年都会受到审计

translation.en: -[Kid sighs] -Kid, I've been doing this a long time.
translation.zh: 基德 我做这一行很久了

translation.en: You give someone that kind of money, it doesn't buy you what you think.
translation.zh: 你给别人那么多钱 只会事与愿违

translation.en: It's a green light, and they keep coming back for more.
translation.zh: 这等于是给他们亮绿灯他们会不停地回来找你要钱

translation.en: That kind of money, it's not one last time.

translation.en: -I hear you. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我明白了-好

translation.en: -I just need to think, I need to, um... -Okay.
translation.zh: -我需要想想 我需要…-好

translation.en: I need to think about, you know, the whole thing.
translation.zh: 我得好好想想整件事

translation.en: -So just hold off. -Yeah, take your time.
translation.zh: -你先暂停-好 你慢慢想

translation.en: -Just hold off. Don't do shit. -Okay.
translation.zh: -你先暂停 什么都不要做-知道了

translation.en: -Till I tell you to do it. -Okay. You got it.
translation.zh: -我会告诉你下一步怎么做-没问题

translation.en: My advice is to reopen the restaurant,
translation.zh: 我的建议是重开餐厅

translation.en: you run the money through there, and, boom, you declare it.
translation.zh: 把钱投到餐厅 然后进行申报

translation.en: Celebrities, they always go stupid with their money in restaurants, it's simple.
translation.zh: 名人一向投资餐厅会失败 很简单

translation.en: So, how are we gonna play it?
translation.zh: 所以 你打算怎么给我钱？

translation.en: I'll get you the money.
translation.zh: 我会给你

translation.en: I mean, but if you want me to give you six mil,

translation.en: you gotta do better than telling me it's all good.

translation.en: How may I ease your mind?

translation.en: Well, how do I know it's not coming back on me?

translation.en: How do I know you haven't talked to the world? Who else knows you're here?

translation.en: Who knows about this, knows about me?

translation.en: -I have none of these answers. -[Ari] Nobody.
translation.zh: -这些我都不知道答案-没有谁

translation.en: Except your brother.

translation.en: -You're just gonna have to trust me. -No.
translation.zh: -你得相信我-不

translation.en: No, that's not gonna fucking fly, man.

translation.en: You gotta do a much better job of selling me than that, Ari.
translation.zh: 除了让我信你的话 你还得做更多

translation.en: Okay, you gotta put my mind at ease.
translation.zh: 你得让我安心

translation.en: If you don't wanna put my mind at ease, then maybe I keep the money.
translation.zh: 如果你不想让我安心 那我就留着钱

translation.en: I'll take my chances with the cops.
translation.zh: 然后去警察那里碰碰运气

translation.en: Me and you may end up sharing a cell, for all I know.
translation.zh: 说不定咱俩会住一间牢房呢

translation.en: [laughs] Okay, maybe we do.
translation.zh: 好吧 或许会是这样

translation.en: I'm sorry, man. You're just not a very good actor.
translation.zh: 抱歉 伙计 你演技不太行

translation.en: But I'll play with you, Hollywood. All right? I'll play. How's this?
translation.zh: 但我愿意配合你 好莱坞巨星好吗？我配合你 不如这样吧

translation.en: In my line of work, someone finds out I got my hooks into something fat,

translation.en: they want a piece of that action.
translation.zh: 他们会想分一杯羹

translation.en: And I don't want that.
translation.zh: 那不是我想看到的

translation.en: When you find gold, you don't tell everyone where it's buried, right?

translation.en: You keep it all to yourself.

translation.en: And you, my friend, I am going to keep all to myself.

translation.en: What about fucking Daphne?

translation.en: How are you so certain that the cops won't find her body on their own?

translation.en: Because it's someplace safe where nobody will find it.
translation.zh: 因为它在一个不会有人找到的安全之地

translation.en: How do I know that in a month you don't go and jack the price up on me?

translation.en: The minute I cash the first check, I am your partner.
translation.zh: 只要我第一张支票兑现我们就是搭档了

translation.en: -I share the same risk. -You're my partner?
translation.zh: -我跟你担同样的风险-你是我的搭档？

translation.en: Okay, so I guess that means I gotta trust you, right?
translation.zh: 好吧 所以我想这说明我得信任你 对吧？

translation.en: We're gonna do the, um… we're gonna do the restaurant thing.
translation.zh: 那就通过餐厅吧

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I'll put it in you and Carlton's name. Y'all take it from there.
translation.zh: 我会把餐厅记在你和卡尔顿的名下你从那里拿钱

translation.en: After that, I don't wanna talk to you no more. I don't wanna see your face.
translation.zh: 然后我再也不想跟你说话我再也不想见到你

translation.en: I don't wanna be associated with you anymore.

translation.en: I don't know if I can do that, I mean,

translation.en: I kinda thought maybe I'd be an… and actor,

translation.en: and maybe you could give me a role in one of your movies.

translation.en: You just think you can shit on me, don't you?

translation.en: You can shit all over me because I need your fucking help, is that what you think?

translation.en: Kid, just take a fucking shower.

translation.en: Have a good shit. Stop waking up with dead girls in your bed,

translation.en: and this will go away.

translation.en: You won't have to do this again. Can we get on with it?

translation.en: How'd you get the body out of here?

translation.en: It's a hotel, there's cameras everywhere, how'd you do it?

translation.en: I had to break some bones.

translation.en: Then I folded her up, into a little ball,

translation.en: and I stuffed her into the cart.

translation.en: We rolled that cart to the service elevator.

translation.en: Fourth floor cameras are out, so we went to the fourth floor and then…
translation.zh: 四楼的摄像头坏了所以我们去了那里 然后…

translation.en: the trash chute's on the fourth floor, it leads down to the Cuthbert Street Dumpster.
translation.zh: 垃圾槽在四楼直接连着卡斯伯特街道的垃圾桶

translation.en: You see, I used to have a contract with this place, this hotel. So…
translation.zh: 是这样 我之前跟这酒店签过合同 所以…

translation.en: And then I wrapped her in a tarp,
translation.zh: 然后我把她用油布裹住

translation.en: and your brother and I, we put her in the trunk of a car,

translation.en: and we went away.
translation.zh: 就开走了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: But I got a question for you now.
translation.zh: 但我现在要问你一件事

translation.en: How does it feel to be so rich?

translation.en: You're unreal, man.

translation.en: It's complicated.

translation.en: [Ari] Well, I've got time.

translation.en: [Kid] Bet you fucking do.

translation.en: Everything I got, I earned. That's all me.

translation.en: I never had my hand out, I never took something that wasn't mine.

translation.en: I never hurt anybody.

translation.en: I took a lot of people with me.

translation.en: A whole lot of fucking people. And all those people rely on me now.
translation.zh: 很多人 他们现在都指着我

translation.en: And now you rely on me.

translation.en: Being rich ain't that simple, Ari.

translation.en: Just like you getting that dead body out of here, it's a lot of twists and turns.
translation.zh: 就像你把那具尸体弄出去会出现各种反转和波折

translation.en: See, the funny thing about making money, the more you make, the more you realize

translation.en: the money is secondary to the decisions you make.

translation.en: Sorry. You really believe that shit, right? Like…

translation.en: No, I'm asking because I saw you on TV, you were doing all that motivational shit.
translation.zh: 我之所以这么问 是因为看到你在电视上各种励志

translation.en: And I thought it was just a bunch of crap, a gimmick,
translation.zh: 我还以为你就是说说而已 搞个噱头

translation.en: but you're standing here telling me, and you actually believe it.
translation.zh: 但你站在这里告诉我你信那套

translation.en: -I do. -All right.
translation.zh: -我真信-好吧

translation.en: When people run up on me and talk shit and think they can get away with it,
translation.zh: 所以有人唬我 以为能蒙混过关时

translation.en: well, that's why that pisses me off. It annoys me.
translation.zh: 这就是让我生气的原因 这让我烦心

translation.en: It annoys the fuck out of me. Because of what I believe, well…

translation.en: That's the reason these same people can't take advantage.

translation.en: Will you just write the fucking check?

translation.en: I heard you.
translation.zh: 明白

translation.en: Write the fucking check.

translation.en: It's so easy to take too. Right?
translation.zh: 拿钱的感觉很好 对吧？

translation.en: Everybody can just fucking take from me.
translation.zh: 所有人都想从我这里拿钱

translation.en: -Why not? It's so fucking easy for me too. -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 有何不可呢？毕竟我来钱这么容易

translation.en: 'Cause everybody else assumes that it's easy,
translation.zh: 所有人都以为我赚钱容易

translation.en: but the difference between you and everybody else is that you…
translation.zh: 但你和他们的区别是…

translation.en: you made a mistake.
translation.zh: 你失误了

translation.en: You told me how to get the fucking body out!

translation.en: You fucker!
translation.zh: 王八蛋！

translation.en: Fuck you!
translation.zh: 去你的吧！

translation.en: -[choking] -Fuck you!
translation.zh: 去你的吧！

translation.en: Fuck you!
translation.zh: 去你的吧！

translation.en: Fuck you! Huh?
translation.zh: 去你的吧！

translation.en: You wanna fucking take from me?
translation.zh: 你想敲我的竹杠？

translation.en: You wanna fucking take from me?
translation.zh: 你想敲我的竹杠？

translation.en: Fuck you.
translation.zh: 去你的

translation.en: Fuck you.
translation.zh: 去你的

translation.en: Get the fuck off me.
translation.zh: 从我身上起开

translation.en: What's up? What you doing up? It's 2:00 a.m. there.
translation.zh: 什么事？你怎么还没睡？那边都凌晨2点了

translation.en: Patrick spent the night, and we watched a scary movie.
translation.zh: 帕特里克在家里过夜我们看来一部恐怖片

translation.en: You're not supposed to watch scary movies.
translation.zh: 你不能看恐怖片的

translation.en: I know, but I did.
translation.zh: 我知道 但我看了

translation.en: Patrick's asleep, and now I'm afraid.
translation.zh: 帕特里克睡着了 但我好害怕

translation.en: You ain't gotta be afraid, man.
translation.zh: 你别害怕 伙计

translation.en: I told you that. Plus, the monsters, they…
translation.zh: 我跟你说过 而且那些怪兽 它们…

translation.en: The monsters only come after the people that they know are scared.
translation.zh: 怪兽只对害它们的人下手

translation.en: Are you having fun?
translation.zh: 你还在玩吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: No, man, I'm not having fun.
translation.zh: 不 我没在玩

translation.en: Why don't you go to bed, okay? I'll call you in the morning.
translation.zh: 你快去睡觉吧 好吗？我明早打给你

translation.en: Okay. Well, I love you.
translation.zh: 好 我爱你

translation.en: I miss you.

translation.en: -I miss you too. -[emotionally] Mm…
translation.zh: 我也想你

translation.en: Go to bed, Dad.

translation.en: What the fuck did you do?

translation.en: I decided that I didn't wanna pay six million dollars.
translation.zh: 我决定不给他那六百万美元

translation.en: ♪ What do we have here now? Do you wanna ride or die? ♪ ♪ La la-da-la la la la la ♪
